select REVIEW_KEY ,REVIEW_TITLE ,(select USER_ID from USER B where B.USER_ID = A.REVIEW_ID)as REVIEW_ID ,REVIEW_CONTENTS ,REVIEW_IMAGE1 ,REVIEW_IMAGE2 ,REVIEW_IMAGE3 ,REVIEW_WDATE ,rnum from ( select A.REVIEW_KEY ,A.REVIEW_ID ,A.REVIEW_TITLE ,A.REVIEW_IMAGE1 ,A.REVIEW_IMAGE2 ,A.REVIEW_IMAGE3 ,A.REVIEW_CONTENTS ,A.REVIEW_WDATE ,@rownum := @rownum+1 AS rnum from REVIEW_BOARD A, (select @rownum:=0) B
where REVIEW_TITLE like concat('%', #{keyword} , '%') or REVIEW_CONTENTS like concat('%', #{keyword} , '%')
where REVIEW_TITLE like concat('%', #{keyword} , '%') or REVIEW_CONTENTS like concat('%', #{keyword} , '%') and REVIEW_CATEGORY = '1'
where REVIEW_TITLE like concat('%', #{keyword} , '%') or REVIEW_CONTENTS like concat('%', #{keyword} , '%')and REVIEW_CATEGORY = '2'
where REVIEW_TITLE like concat('%', #{keyword} , '%') or REVIEW_CONTENTS like concat('%', #{keyword} , '%') and REVIEW_CATEGORY = '3'
order by REVIEW_KEY desc ) A limit #{start}, #{pageSize}

select A.REVIEW_KEY ,A.REVIEW_ID ,A.REVIEW_TITLE ,A.REVIEW_IMAGE1 ,A.REVIEW_IMAGE2 ,A.REVIEW_IMAGE3 ,A.REVIEW_CONTENTS ,A.REVIEW_WDATE ,A.REVIEW_CATEGORY ,A.REVIEW_LIKE ,A.REVIEW_HIT from REVIEW_BOARD A where REVIEW_KEY=#{review_key}
